data.name: Taoist Priest Yan
data.detailed_description: Taoist priest Yan is a 3D RPG game. Players will play Yan Chixia, a famous Exorcist in ancient times. There are many tombs in this forest. Darkness turns evil and gives birth to many demons and ghosts. They haunt at night, lure and kill pedestrians and eat their blood and body. Yan Chixia heard about it and came here to destroy them.
data.about_the_game: Taoist priest Yan is a 3D RPG game. Players will play Yan Chixia, a famous Exorcist in ancient times. There are many tombs in this forest. Darkness turns evil and gives birth to many demons and ghosts. They haunt at night, lure and kill pedestrians and eat their blood and body. Yan Chixia heard about it and came here to destroy them.
data.short_description: Taoist priest Yan is a 3D RPG game. Players will play a famous Exorcist. There are many tombs in this forest. Darkness gives birth to many demons and ghosts. They haunt at night, lure and kill pedestrians and eat their blood and body. Yan Chixia heard about it and came here to destroy them.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core E3-1230v3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, you will see some human bones with blood and boiled human bone soup.
